page.title: 12+++ HOUSING ++++
page.content: Housing in MALPAS VILLAGE. A survey carried out by the chidren in class 3 at Malpas Primary School.(AGES 6,7). 1.Detatched house. 7 2.Semi detatched house. 12. 3.Bungalow. 1 4.Terraced House. 4 5.Shop. 1 6.Pub. 1 7.Farm.7 GLOSSARY Detatched House: an individual house usually 3 or more bedrooms not joined to any other building. Semi detatched House: A house joined to one other building of the same type or design.2,3 or 4 bedrooms. Bungalow: A single storey (floor or level) detatched or semi detatched 2,3 or4 bedrooms. Glossary continued on page 13.
